Plot: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.
Title: Breakfast on Pluto
Writer: Neil Jordan, Pat McCabe, Pat McCabe (book)
Actors: Cillian Murphy, Morgan Jones, Eva Birthistle, Liam Neeson
tomatoConsensus: Well-acted if monotonous drama about a transvestite prostitute in London during the 1970s.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 15 nominations.
